entities.name: grim
entities.description: The Grim is a mysterious entity that has appeared twice, causing near-fatal accidents. It is mentioned as something Harry hasn't told anyone about.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who would panic if he knew about the Grim.

relationships.description: The appearance of the Grim causes Ron to panic. This relationship is described as Harry knowing that Ron would panic if he knew about the Grim.
